authors: McGivern, Bridget B [Colorado State Univ., Fort Collins, CO (United States)] (ORCID:0000000190230018)

description: Members of the genus Citricoccus are recognized as salt tolerant soil microoorganisms. Here we report the metagenome assembled genome of a novel Citricoccus species recoverd from untilled, surface agricultural soils in Western Colorado.
research_orgs: U.S. Department of Energy Systems Biology Knowledgebase
sponsor_orgs: USDOE Office of Science (SC), Biological and Environmental Research (BER)
title: KBase Narrative - O'Toole et al Citricoccus MRA Genome Announcement Analysis Narrative
